RateAdjustmentByTier.name: RateAdjustmentByTier
RateAdjustmentByTier.description: Represents the adjustments for the rate of a resource thatâ€™s determined based on the specified tiers. This object stores information about the type of adjustment used, the value of the adjustment type, and any applicable boundaries.

AdjustmentValue.description: Value of the rate adjustment based on the selected adjustment type.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the associated rate card entry comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time until when the associated rate card entry remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LowerBound.description: Minimum quantity of the rate adjustment value that can be applied to the record. This value must be a positive integer and must be less than the upper bound of the tier.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the rate adjustment by tier record.

ProductId.description: ID of the product whose resource is being used as the associated rate card entry.

ProductSellingModelId.description: ID of the product selling model for the associated rate card entry record.

RateCardEntryId.description: ID of the rate card entry associated with this rate adjustment by tier record.

RateCardEntryStatus.description: Status of the rate card entry associated with this rate adjustment by tier.

RateCardId.description: ID of the rate card of the associated rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureId.description: ID of the standard unit of measure record of the associated rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureName.description: Name of the standard unit of measure record of the associated rate card entry.

UpperBound.description: Maximum quantity of the rate adjustment value that can be applied to the record. This value must be a positive double and must be greater than the lower bound of the tier.

UsageResourceId.description: ID of the resource selected for the associated rate card entry.
